Name: Bugz!
About the game: Venture into the world Bugz to capture, research and compete with your team of Bugz! Bugz is a turn based RPG where you capture a team of 4 Bugz and are working for a laboratory interested in studying the potential of monsters known as Bugz. The game is about 3-4 hours long and there are 4 arena competitions that you must complete! Each Bug has it's own type and a few abilities that makes it different from other Bugz. The main focus is on experimenting with different captured Bugz to form the strongest team.
